title: Lite User - No Favorite Team - Top Stories
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
and does not have a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on Top Stories

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app not running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to MLB News

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to MLB News

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on a modal (News articles, GDA Page)
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to MLB News

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on Gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to MLB News

custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to MLB Videos

custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to MLB Videos

title: Lite User - No Favorite Team - Offseason
custom_preconds:
Given it is during the offseason

("isOffSeason" : 1 is set in the iPhoneConfig.json)
custom_steps:
When a Lite user has no Favorite Team
and the user long presses the At Bat icon
custom_expected:
Then the user will see:
News
Videos
Standings
Ask At Bat

title: Lite User - Favorite Team - Live Gameday
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
and has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on <Team> Gameday
custom_expected: Then the user will not see a Gameday entry interstitial ad

title: Lite User - Favorite Team - Gameday
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
and has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on <Team> Gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app not running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to Gameday for their team's game

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to Gameday for their team's game

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on a modal (News articles, GDA Page)
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to Gameday for their team's game

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on Gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to Gameday for their team's game

Given it is the offseason

title: Paid User - No Favorite Team - Listen Live
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
and does not have a favorite team set
and has logged in with a paid account
and Show Audio is enabled (IAB-13884)
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on Listen Live

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app not running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and no feed selected

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and no feed selected

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on a modal (News articles, GDA Page)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and no feed selected

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on Gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and no feed selected

title: Paid User - No Favorite Team - Offseason
custom_preconds:
Given "isOffSeason": 1 is set in the iPhoneConfig.json
and "shouldShowAudioLink" is set to false in iphoneConfigExtras and iphoneConfigExtrasLite
custom_steps:
When a Paid user has no Favorite Team
and the user long presses the At Bat icon
custom_expected:
Then the user will see:
News
Videos
Standings
Ask At Bat

title: Paid User - Favorite Team - Listen Live (active feed)
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
and has a favorite team set
and has logged in with a paid account
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on Listen to the <Team> Live

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app not running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and the Favorite Team's audio feeds begins to play

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and the Favorite Team's audio feeds begins to play

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on a modal (News articles, GDA Page)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and the Favorite Team's audio feeds begins to play

custom_steps_separated.content: with the app backgrounded on Gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user is taken to Gameday Audio modal
and the Favorite Team's audio feeds begins to play

title: Paid User - Favorite Team - Offseason
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on a device which supports 3D Touch
and it is the offseason
and "isOffSeason" : 1 is set in the iPhoneConfig.json
custom_steps:
When a Paid user has a Favorite Team
and the user long presses the At Bat icon
custom_expected:
Then the user will see:
<Team> News (team logo)
Top Stories
Ask At Bat

title: Scoreboard 10am Flip
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: prior to 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: then see the previous day's Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: after 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: then see the current day's Scoreboard

title: Gameday 10am Flip
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
and has already went through on boarding
custom_steps:
When a user long presses the At Bat icon
and taps on <Team> Gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: prior to 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to previous day's game (Wrap)

custom_steps_separated.content: after 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is taken to the current day's game
